description: Managing Financial Chaos: This project presents a data-driven framework for credit risk prediction, sentiment-assisted portfolio optimization, and Monte Carlobased risk simulation using Python. It integrates financial analytics, machine learning, and quantitative optimization to evaluate risk exposure.
ML.NET is an open source and cross-platform machine learning framework for .NET.
A machine-learning framework analyzing audio features, genre, and lyrics to predict and model song popularity

Introduction to Artificial Intelligence covering search, reasoning, and machine learning. Focus on building intelligent systems that learn, adapt, and solve real-world problems using Python and modern AI frameworks.

scikit-learn_bench benchmarks various implementations of machine learning algorithms across data analytics frameworks. It currently support the scikit-learn, DAAL4PY, cuML, and XGBoost frameworks for commonly used machine learning algorithms.

Promotion  Sensitive  Hierarchical Probabilistic  Forecasting  Demand is  an advanced  machine  learning  framework  designed to  accurately  forecast  Consumer  demand by  capturing  promotional  effects  hierarchical  sales  dependencies  uncertainty  distributions  across products regions time scales
Geospatial Machine Learning Framework for Maritime Anomaly Detection and Illegal Fishing Prevention

This repository contains my personal projects and experiments in Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning. It includes hands-on practice with algorithms, model training, data preprocessing, and deep learning frameworks. My goal is to build a strong foundation in AI/ML by experimenting, learning, and sharing my progress with the community.
Code repository for the publication "STROKE-ASSIST: a novel machine learning framework for stroke type identification in resource-constrained settings resilient to missing data"

Modular Forensic Triage Framework -Cross-platform evidence extraction & prioritization for Android, iOS, Windows, and Linux. Integrates NLP, behavioral anomaly detection, and memory analysis with 97.4% detection coverage and 2.7x faster triage than traditional tools.Digital Forensics Machine Learning NLP Cross-Platform Python Android IoS Windows

Research and implementation of optimal transport methods in financial modeling. Explores risk-neutral measure learning, calibration, and pricing through geometric and probabilistic frameworks, linking advanced mathematics, machine learning, and modern asset valuation theory.
Predict traffic accident severity using advanced machine learning and explainable AI, enhancing road safety with clear insights from comprehensive data analysis.
Using Convolutional Neural Networks and state-of-the-art Machine learning frameworks for real time clinical diagnosis

This research investigates the optimization potential of distributed machine learning through strategic data reduction using the MapReduce framework within cloud computing environments. The project demonstrates that 5-10% data reduction preserves language model accuracy while achieving 8-16% reduction in total compute time.

A hands-on project implementing and analyzing core machine learning algorithms from scratch and using popular frameworks. The project explores supervised and unsupervised learning techniques, model evaluation and performance optimization using Python libraries like scikit learn, NumPy and Pandas.
Machine Learning Framework to Identify Coral Bacteria Associated with Thermal Resilience

Data-Driven Predictions for NFL Games and Player Props  This repository contains a modular, end-to-end machine learning framework for predicting NFL game outcomes, point spreads, and player prop performances using historical team and player data.
A high-performance neural network plugin for Godot 4.x, powered by Rust and Candle ML framework. Add real-time machine learning capabilities to your games with easy-to-use Brain nodes.

A machine learning framework using Logistic Regression, Random Forest, and XGBoost to detect credit card fraud in real time. Built on the Kaggle dataset, it delivers scalable, explainable, and business-ready risk scoring for banks and financial institutions.
An open source machine learning framework, designed for regression tasks

This repository contains the complete implementation and dataset for a comparative study on machine learning and deep learning models applied to resting-state EEG data of adolescents. The research investigates the performance of models such as SVM, DNN, Random Forest, Logistic Regression, and KNN in classifying eyes-open and eyes-closed brain state
Predict football match outcomes using the W-5 Multi-Agent AI Consensus Framework, achieving high accuracy with a blend of AI and machine learning techniques.
This is a tensorflow project that is a computer vision model that predicts the presence of humans with the computer's camera. It uses the python machine learning framework, tensorflow.
Visualizer (name is subjected to be changed later) is a framework and resource to allow people to create and use visualizers of different computer science and machine learning algorithms.

Unified heuristics + machine learning framework for detecting Modbus/TCP anomalies in industrial control systems. Implements an Evaluation Integrity Protocol (EIP) for dataset, metrics and reproducibility consistency.
Machine learning-based classification framework for detecting spatially extended and diffuse emission in the high redshift universe, using multi-band broadband imaging.

AIxOps Engineering is a unified framework for MLOps, LLMOps, and AIOps. It provides end-to-end pipelines, best practices, and tools to build, deploy, monitor, and scale machine learning models, large language models, and AI-driven systems, enabling streamlined AI lifecycle management across diverse environments.
A curated list of awesome machine learning frameworks, libraries and software (by language). I

Cifer provides a decentralized AI development ecosystem with data-ownership proof on the Cifer blockchain, using a Privacy-Preserving Machine Learning (PPML) framework offers several methods for secure, private, collaborative machine learning Federated Learning and Fully Homomorphic Encryption

This study presents a computational experiment demonstrating the violation of Bells Inequality through machine learning simulation. By modeling entangled particle correlations and applying data-driven analysis, the research shows how quantum mechanical predictions defy local realism. Using linear regression to approximate quantum correlations,
A comprehensive machine learning framework for dark sector physics analysis

A collection of end-to-end machine learning projects showcasing my skills in data preprocessing, feature engineering, model building, evaluation, and deployment. Each project is designed to demonstrate real-world problem-solving, statistical reasoning, and model interpretability using industry-standard tools and frameworks.

Implementation and reproduction of Extreme Learning Machines (ELM) for European options pricing under the Heston stochastic volatility model. Features fast ELM-based option pricing with multiple analytical methods (COS, Fourier, Monte Carlo), comprehensive evaluation framework, and synthetic data generation. Based on Cheng et al. (2025) research.

This repository contains the full-stack code for a serverless, real-time water quality monitoring system. An ESP32 microcontroller sends sensor data (pH, turbidity, etc.) to a serverless backend on AWS, which processes the data, runs a machine learning model, stores it in DynamoDB. A dynamic web frontend then visualizes this data on a Leaflet map.

It is an intelligent web-based disease prediction system designed to assist healthcare professionals and patients in identifying potential Heart, Lung, and Brain disorders using machine learning models.It provides an easy to use interface where users can input key health parameters, and the system predicts the disease occurrence with high accuracy.
Sum-of-Gaussians Neural Network (SOG-Net) is a lightweight and versatile framework for integrating long-range interactions into machine learning force field.

ChatGPT said:  An AI-driven framework that optimizes crop selection and water management using climate, soil, and rainfall data. It leverages machine learning to recommend sustainable, region-specific crops and predict water availability, promoting climate-resilient and resource-efficient farming practices.

Se profundiza en los fundamentos del aprendizaje automtico (Machine Learning), aprendizaje profundo (Deep Learning) y anlisis predictivo, capacitando a los estudiantes en el uso de bibliotecas y frameworks como TensorFlow, Scikit-Learn y Keras.
A differentiable ray tracer using the PyTorch machine-learning framework in Python.

Bioinformatics and Machine Learning framework for in silico prediction of candidiasis-related microRNAs. Includes data processing, feature engineering, and ML models for miRNA-disease association prediction.

This project is a hands-on application of machine learning to solve a real-world problem: predicting laptop prices. It features a Random Forest Regressor model, trained on a dataset of laptop specifications, and deployed as a simple web application using the Flask framework. The entire workflow, from data cleaning in a Jupyter Notebook to function

This project is a Spam Email Classifier developed using the Naive Bayes algorithm implemented in Java with the Weka machine learning framework. It aims to identify and classify emails as spam or non-spam based on text features. Programming Language: Java  Machine Learning Library: Weka  Dataset: UCI Spambase.
An evaluation framework for machine learning models simulating high-throughput materials discovery.
Machine-Learning Driven Auto-Scaling DataUtility Framework Empowers Scalable, Secure, and Decentralized Data Analytics
Machine Learning Pose Detection Framework for Suspicious Activity Detection
A hybrid quantum-classical machine learning framework that leverages quantum computing for enhanced pattern recognition and optimization.

This project introduces WattAI, an AI-powered web platform designed to predict and visualize electricity billing based on user-defined parameters. Built using the Django web framework and integrated with a machine learning modelRandom Forest RegressorWattAI estimates monthly energy usage .

The PALLAS simulation is a Geant4-based framework designed for modeling plasma-based particle beams. It combines traditional Geant4 particle sources with machine learning-based ONNX inference for beam generation, and provides high-fidelity magnetic field and quadrupole tracking.

Mapping Alternate Scenarios of Forest Intactness (MASFI) is a cloud-based machine learning framework. It uses XGBoost regression and remote sensing data such as GEDI LiDAR to create high-resolution maps and statistics, supporting protected area planning and management.

This repository contains my end-to-end solutions for various Kaggle competitions, showcasing data preprocessing, exploratory analysis, model training, and performance evaluation using Python and machine learning frameworks.
Hybrid machine learning framework for analyzing industrial IoT data, combining clustering and classification to identify machine behavior patterns and detect underperforming equipment.

Space Labs AI presents: A radiation-tolerant machine learning framework enabling neural networks to operate reliably in space environments. Features adaptive protection, Reed-Solomon error correction, and breakthrough architecture optimizations that improve performance under radiation.
TinyTorch is a minimalist framework for building machine learning systems from scratchfrom tensors to systems.
DeepMol: A Machine and Deep Learning Framework for Computational Chemistry
A collection of hands-on machine learning and deep learning projects, including image classification, text classification, and summarization with modern frameworks (TensorFlow, PyTorch, HuggingFace)
A minimal library for accessible Machine Learning workflows within the KDD framework. You can use a MLwrap tutorial at: https://psyarxiv.com/j6m4z
Hyperparameter optimization algorithms for use in the MLJ machine learning framework

Implementation of the Online Model Reuse Framework from the paper On the Reusability of Machine Learning Models in Edge Computing: A Statistical Learning Approach (FTC 2022). Explores statistical learning methods to identify reusable ML models across edge nodes using dataset similarity (MMD) and one-class SVMs.

Educational project on the discipline "Introduction to machine learning"   This repository contains an implementation of a speech emotion recognition system based on deep learning. The project was developed within the framework of the academic discipline and is exclusively educational in nature.
Project for Applied Machine Learning 2, attempting to discover optimal noise profiles through an uncertainty-aware multi-generator evolutionary framework for GANs.

This repository contains test data and results from the modeling phase of a comprehensive algorithmic fairness study across two financial datasets: the HMDA and CCD datasets. The framework evaluates bias and discrimination patterns through 8 distinct modeling approaches, from standard machine learning to intentionally biased baselines

A security framework for Hinglish chatbots that detects and prevents prompt injection attacks using rule-based and machine learning methods. It preprocesses code-mixed text, identifies malicious inputs, and ensures safe, reliable, and real-time AI interactions in bilingual environments.
A differentiable PDE solving framework for machine learning

This Python script is a complete backend for a web application built using the Flask framework. Its central purpose is to power an AI-driven title generator by exposing a machine learning model through a simple web API.
A Machine-Learning Framework for Epileptic Seizure Identification using Bangalore EEG Data

A powerful hybrid machine learning framework combining the predictive strengths of multiple algorithms using Voting, Blending, and Stacking. Includes FastAPI for real-time inference and Streamlit for interactive visualizationclean, modular, and production-ready

Kolmo is a project that combines physics informed machine learning, statistical learning, sensor fusion and stochastic analysis to provide a robust framework for real-time modelling of dynamical systems under uncertainty

Repository for the paper Machine Learning-Based Prediction and Geometric Quality Assessment in 3D Concrete Printing. Includes experimental data, preprocessing scripts, CatBoost/DecisionTree ML models, and code for printability maps and geometric quality metrics in 3DCP.

Developed a machine learningbased framework to assess credit risk in World Bankfunded projects across India. Integrated financial and macroeconomic data to model PD, EAD, LGD, and ECL using CatBoost, applied SHAP for interpretability, and performed sectoral aggregation and stress testing for portfolio risk insights.
An MLOps framework to package, deploy, monitor and manage thousands of production machine learning models

Smart Flight Booking App is an intelligent flight reservation platform built with React.js and Django REST Framework that uses machine learning for price prediction, enabling users to seamlessly search, compare, and book flights through a secure, responsive, and visually appealing interface.

This repository explores Machine Learning through projects, scripts, and tutorials. It covers data preprocessing, model training, evaluation, and deployment using frameworks like scikit-learn, TensorFlow, and PyTorch, with applications in classification, regression, NLP, and computer vision.
A non-intrusive cascading FFT-informed machine learning (FIML) framework for detecting both electrical and mechanical faults in squirrel-cage induction motors.

This project develops neural-network surrogate models for fast, accurate European option pricing under stochastic volatility frameworks. Traditional methods like Monte Carlo simulations are computationally expensive. The goal is to use machine learning models, trained on synthetic data, for orders-of-magnitude faster pricing with similar accuracy.

A high-performance framework for building intelligent trading systems that fuse mathematics, data science, and market intuition. Integrates quantitative research, machine learning, and risk analytics to generate alpha, manage exposure, and refine execution across multiple asset classes and evolving market conditions.
code and dates
Machine learning integration framework for semiconductor design automation that optimizes placement, routing, and timing closure in chip design workflows.

Focuses on ML application design, using frameworks for Windows-based web apps. Covers APIs, Flask, and Docker for deploying ML models. Students gain hands-on experience in building scalable and production-ready ML systems.

A fast, distributed, high performance gradient boosting (GBT, GBDT, GBRT, GBM or MART) framework based on decision tree algorithms, used for ranking, classification and many other machine learning tasks.
A supervised machine learning framework for identifying money laundering transactions in bank data.

A Wireless InSitebased simulation framework for generating realistic 5G fingerprint datasets to support indoor localization research. Includes simulation configuration, simulated data, and scripts for extracting, loading, and transforming data for machine learning algorithms.

AI Innovation at Google DevFest ATL 2025 This repository showcases our AI project developed for Google DevFest Atlanta 2025. The project integrates machine learning, real-time data processing, and intelligent automation to solve real-world challenges through innovative use of Google Cloud AI and open-source frameworks.
Conceptual framework for counterfactual machine learning  bridging causal inference, AI ethics, and applied economics.

An acausal modeling framework for automatically parallelized scientific machine learning (SciML) in Julia. A computer algebra system for integrated symbolics for physics-informed machine learning and automated transformations of differential equations
A set of Docker images that include popular frameworks for machine learning, data science and visualization.
This repository contains all the machine learning and deep learning model I have implemented using various frameworks like keras, tensorflow, scikit-learn, pytorch, etc.

A Hybrid QuantumMachine Learning Framework for precision farming that integrates Random Forest, XGBoost, and Qiskit-based Quantum models to predict crop yield and profitability, enabling data-driven decisions for sustainable agriculture using Streamlit.

A high-performance fraud analytics framework leveraging advanced ensemble learning and feature explainability for large-scale healthcare claims data. Integrates gradient boosting, random forests, and anomaly detection models with SHAP-based interpretability to uncover fraudulent behavioral patterns in real time.
Machine Learning-based framework for redshift estimation and cosmological parameter inference using Gamma-Ray Bursts as potential standard candles.
A cutting-edge AI-driven network intrusion detection system that combines classical deep learning, quantum machine learning, probabilistic reasoning, and explainable AI into a unified framework.

This project implements web threat analysis using both machine learning and deep learning techniques. It leverages a variety of libraries to preprocess data, build models, and evaluate their performance. The goal is to provide a robust framework for detecting and mitigating web-based threats such as malware, phishing, and other cybersecurity risks.
Minerva is a framework for training machine learning models for researchers.
Enhancing Malignant Transformation Predictions in Oral Potentially Malignant Disorders: A Novel Machine Learning Framework Using Real-World Data
Traffic Flow visualization framework for showing data actuals and machine learning (any) model predictions on a real road network. Currently supports only METR-LA.

Tywra ML is a front-end machine learning website built using the React.js library and the Next.js framework. This website was created as a simple project while also continuing advanced learning of JavaScript.

This project presents a complete data science workflow for predicting real estate prices through a comparative analysis of machine learning models. The core aim is to develop a highly accurate and interpretable predictive tool by processing raw data, evaluating multiple regression algorithms, and optimizing the best-performing solution.
Machine learningdriven backtesting framework for EUR 10-year rates, featuring intraday TP/SL execution, walk-forward modelling, and performance analytics.

TensorFlow is an open-source machine learning framework developed by Google. It provides strong support for various platforms, especially Linux, and is widely adopted in the industry due to its active community and production-ready capabilities.

Interpretable machine learning framework for thyroid disease diagnosis using ensemble stacking and feature selection methods. Incorporates SHAP and LIME to ensure model transparency and explainability.
